entries.description: Network errors causing premature SSO logout
Fix SyntaxError causing premature expiration (edge case)
Amazon Q Code Transformation: show instructions for finding JDK path on Linux
UI: 'Start using Amazon Q' may display even if the user is signed in.
Add getFeature and isEnabled utility methods to FeatureConfigProvider
Amazon Q /dev: include in progress state agent in code generation
Reduce workspace CPU indexing time by 50%
